publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2496# Linda Fabiani: Lanarkshire Voluntary Housing Forumâ€”That the Parliament congratulates housing associations in Lanarkshire on the creation of the Lanarkshire Voluntary Housing Forum which was launched on 26 November 2001; notes the positive involvement of both South and North Lanarkshire Councils, and expresses particular thanks to the Forum's voluntary committee members who work tirelessly to ensure that their housing associations provide decent affordable housing to those who choose or require to rent.
S1M-2496# Lanarkshire Voluntary Housing Forum (lodged on 29 November 2001) Michael Matheson*
S1M-2496# Lanarkshire Voluntary Housing Forum (lodged on 29 November 2001) Andrew Wilson*, Michael Russell*, Karen Gillon*
S1M-2496# Lanarkshire Voluntary Housing Forum (lodged on 29 November 2001) Donald Gorrie*
S1M-2496# Lanarkshire Voluntary Housing Forum (lodged on 29 November 2001) Fiona McLeod*
S1M-2496# Lanarkshire Voluntary Housing Forum (lodged on 29 November 2001) Fiona Hyslop*
S1M-2496# Lanarkshire Voluntary Housing Forum (lodged on 29 November 2001) Mr Kenneth Gibson*
S1M-2496# Lanarkshire Voluntary Housing Forum (lodged on 29 November 2001) Mr Kenny MacAskill*
